concept.title: Ethernet Driver Overview
concept.shortdesc: The ethernet driver is used for testing purposes.

section.title: Purpose
section.p: Ethernet is used as a substitute for mobile to server communications.

dd.p: An established standard for cable based network communication between computers.

section.title: Architecture
section.p: Ethernet is used as a substitute for wireless communication.
It sits below the protocol modules.

section.title: APIs
section.p: The APIs used by this LDD are:

entry.p: Stores an instance of the previously created CLANLinkFactory and can call its methods.
Provides interface methods for both bearers and packet drivers.
The base class from which bearer classes are derived.
Handles the Ethernet NIF bearer interface for the IP4 protocol.
Handles the Ethernet NIF bearer interface for the IP6 protocol.

section.title: Typical uses
section.p: Ethernet was never intended to be used by the general phone user: however it has proved to be very useful for development where it is used as a substitute for the communication between a mobile and an external server, for example, a base station or a Wi-Fi server.
